overview: John is working for an unscrupulous photographer by the name of Brett who uses his skills to seduce unsuspecting young models.  In walks Pam convinced the ladder to success starts in Brett's bedroom. That is until Josh sends her explicit photos to Brett's most cautious client.  Brett loses said account. Josh picks it up and Pam gets the mainstream spread she always dreamed of.  Join us in the triumphant return of a superstar. Heather Hunter in Wave's Fashion Plate.  The new fashion statement from the lens of Toni English.
title: Fashion Plate
